This vignette provides access to the full FormIOr handbook.

## Online handbook

- <https://drrodrigosolis-dev.github.io/-RSS-FormIOr/handbook/index.html>

## Installed handbook

- HTML: `../extdata/handbook/index.html`
- Markdown: `../extdata/handbook/index.md`

If your viewer blocks local file links, use:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
handbook <- system.file("extdata", "handbook", "index.html", package = "FormIOr")
browseURL(handbook)
```
